commands.name: Basic GET Request
commands.description: Simple GET request to fetch a webpage or API endpoint

commands.name: GET with Headers
commands.description: GET request showing response headers

commands.name: GET with Verbose Output
commands.description: GET request with detailed connection information

commands.name: GET with User Agent
commands.description: GET request with custom user agent
commands.template: curl -k -s -H "User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36" {target}

commands.name: JSON API GET
commands.description: GET request with JSON headers for API calls

commands.name: POST JSON Data
commands.description: POST request with JSON payload (requires additional data parameter)

commands.name: PUT JSON Data
commands.description: PUT request with JSON payload (requires additional data parameter)

commands.name: DELETE Request
commands.description: DELETE request to remove a resource

commands.name: HEAD Request
commands.description: HEAD request to get only response headers without body

commands.name: Follow Redirects
commands.description: GET request that follows redirects automatically

commands.name: Download File
commands.description: Download a file and save it locally

commands.name: Basic Authentication
commands.description: GET request with basic authentication (requires username:password)

commands.name: Bearer Token Auth
commands.description: GET request with Bearer token authorization

commands.name: Cookie Request
commands.description: GET request with cookie support

commands.name: Form Data POST
commands.description: POST request with form-encoded data

commands.name: File Upload POST
commands.description: POST request to upload a file

commands.name: XML API Request
commands.description: GET request for XML API endpoints

commands.name: GraphQL Query
commands.description: POST request for GraphQL endpoints
commands.template: curl -k -s -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{{"query": "{{ users {{ id name }} }}"}}' {target}

commands.name: WebDAV PROPFIND
commands.description: PROPFIND request for WebDAV servers

commands.name: OPTIONS Request
commands.description: OPTIONS request to discover allowed methods

commands.name: PATCH Request
commands.description: PATCH request for partial updates

commands.name: Timeout Request
commands.description: GET request with connection timeout

commands.name: Proxy Request
commands.description: GET request through HTTP proxy

commands.name: Certificate Info
commands.description: Get SSL certificate information

commands.name: Rate Limited Request
commands.description: GET request with rate limiting (slow)
